  • SEARCH: 
 

Package etomica.models.water

Library of molecular models of Water. These models are generally fitted to experimental or ab-initio data and attempt to accurately describe interactions of real molecules. Potentials, Species, Conformations, and other classes are included to define inter- and intra- molecular interactions and molecular structures.

    Conformation for 4-point water molecule (plus 1 site at the COM).

    Conformation for 4-point water molecule.
    DipoleSourceWater
    Implementation of DipoleSource that can handle water molecules that are MoleculeOriented.

    OrientationCalcWater4P  
    P2HardAssociationGCPMReference  
    P2Water3P
    3-point potential for water.
    P2Water3PSoft
    3-point potential for water that can calculate gradient and torque (for the center of mass of the water molecule).
    P2Water4P
    4-point potential for water.
    P2Water4PSoft
    3-point potential for water that can calculate gradient and torque (for the center of mass of the water molecule).
    P2WaterSPC
    SPC potential for water.
    P2WaterSPCE
    SPC/E potential for water.
    P2WaterSPCSoft
    SPC potential for water.
    P2WaterSzalewicz
    Water potential as described by http://dx.doi.org/10.1063/1.4875097 This class handles 2-body, 3-body and induction terms.
    P2WaterTIP4P
    TIP4P potential for water.
    P2WaterTIP4PHardCore
    4-point potential for water.
    P2WaterTIP4PSoft
    TIP4P potential for water.
    PNWaterGCPM
    GCPM Water potential class.
    PNWaterGCPMThreeSite
    GCPM Water potential with three association site for Wertheim approach.
    SpeciesWater3P
    Species for 3-point water molecule.
    SpeciesWater3POriented  
    SpeciesWater4P
    Species for 4-point water molecule.
    SpeciesWater4PCOM
